titles.title: Increasing Access to Adviser Information Act
Increasing Access to Adviser Information Act
A bill to provide that broker-dealers who provide research services to an investment manager and receive payments from certain accounts is not an investment adviser, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary:
Increasing Access to Adviser Information Act
This bill excludes from investment adviser regulations any research activity performed by a broker or a dealer in line with similar foreign laws and regulations.
